item.title: Brexit Negotiations: A Comprehensive Guide
item.description:
Professor Steve Peers The UK formally initiated the Brexit process by sending the Article 50 withdrawal letter to the EU on March 29th. The EU responded with its draft Brexit negotiating guidelines. This post offers a thorough analysis of the EU’s draft guidelines, comparing them to the UK’s stance as articulated in Theresa May’s Chatham House speech last January. Although subject to potential modifications before their final adoption on April 29th, significant alterations to the draft guidelines are improbable...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/brexit-negotiations-a-comprehensive-guide/
